snippet: When Ward scored to beat the Rangers on Thursday, it was the third time a winning goal had been scored in the final two seconds of an N.H.L. playoff game.
lead_paragraph: When Ward scored to beat the Rangers on Thursday, it was the third time a winning goal had been scored in the final two seconds of an N.H.L. playoff game.

headline.main: Joel Ward’s Rare Feat for the Capitals
headline.print_headline: Joel Ward’s Rare Feat for the Capitals
